content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI previously appended an image to the poem file using the command "append_to_file" and executed the command "read_file". The "read_file" command returned the poem and image. I then used the command "write_to_file" to save the poem and image to a new file named "saved_river_poem.txt". The latest development shows that the "write_to_file" command successfully saved the file. I then used the command "delete_file" to delete the file "my_river_poem.txt" and it was successful. I also attempted to clone a repository using the command "clone_repository" but it returned an error saying the repository was not found.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ping -c 3 google.com"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: ping: not found\\n'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo apt-get install -y iputils-ping"}}}'}]
"""
